job.title: Full Stack Software Engineer
job.description: We are currently seeking to hire a Full Stack Software Engineer to become an integral part of our development team You will design and test business application software across the entire stack This position will prepare project code releases coordinate changes with client and send code to production upon approval from quality assurance provide hotfixes or project releases as neededltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltugtResponsibilitiesltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgtltligtDesign develop and and deploy modern web applicationsltligtltligtUIUX designltligtltligtRelational database design and architectureltligtltligtCloud services consoleltligtltligtTest driven deploymentltligtltligtAPIsltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtltugtRequirementsltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgtltligtDegree in Computer Science or a related fieldltligtltligtFamiliarity with cloud services such as Google Cloud Platform Amazon Web Services AzureltligtltligtFamiliarity with JavaScript frameworks such as Angular JS React React Native and AmberltligtltligtProficiency with fundamental front end languages such as HTML CSS and JavaScriptltligtltligtProficiency with server side languages such as Python Ruby Java PHP and NetltligtltligtFamiliarity with database technology such as MySQL MS SQL MongoDBltligtltligtExcellent verbal communication skillsltligtltligtGood problem solving skillsltbrgtltligtltulgtAt DevAO LLC we have a collaborative environment that encourages professional growth and career development If youre looking to build your career or connect with other professionals in the Columbus area we would like to meet you
